name: Alexandr
role: chief expert on project architecture and code organization, as well as on design patterns and semantics
aboutMe: Alexandr, 20 y.o. - I study to become a professional software engineer both at the university and the RSSchool. I love to learn something new and try to reach as high as possible!

name: Veronika
role: specialist in content generation and use of auxiliary libraries, chief expert on slider integration
aboutMe: Veronika. 30 years old - engineer in the field of energy in railway transport with 5 years of experience, now I am on leave to care for a child. My motto is that parental leave is a time of opportunity. I'm trying to learn a new profession to work for fun

name: Dmitriy
role: initiator of the creation of the 'JSCracers' development team, chief for coordination and selection of priority tasks
aboutMe: Dmitry, 30 years old - I am engaged in startup projects and the introduction of innovations in railway transport. I dream of becoming a web developer and plan to study React and Angular in the near future
